paper_abstract: An active circuit suitable for realizing floating inductance, capacitance, FDNR and admittance converter depending on the selection of passive elements of the circuit is presented. The proposed circuit employs only two dual output second-generation current conveyors (DO-CCIIs) and does not require passive element matching. The proposed network has a grounded capacitor for the floating inductance and capacitance simulation. Frequency performance of the circuit is tested using SPICE.
paper_title: A versatile active circuit for realising floating inductance, capacitance, FDNR and admittance converter
